body_html: @mmpinso, @liangxiao05, did you succeed in coloring the result after processing the image with a neural network? If so, how do you do this? I'm trying to implement a function from the examples of the opencv - colorizeSegmentation library in the Java language, but so far it has not turned out.

body: @mmpinso, @liangxiao05, did you succeed in coloring the result after processing the image with a neural network? If so, how do you do this? I'm trying to implement a function from the examples of the opencv - colorizeSegmentation library in the Java language, but so far it has not turned out.
